  • Field Details

    • id

      @PsaRstApiMapFld(keyField=1, value="PSC_GID") public String id
      identifier of the record (primary key or PSC_GID)

    • created_at

      @PsaRstApiMapFld("PSC_CRE") public String created_at
      creation date of this record

    • created_by

      @PsaRstApiMapFld("PSC_OWN") @PsaRstApiMapUsr public String created_by
      user name of the person who has created this record

    • modified_at

      @PsaRstApiMapFld("PSC_UPD") public String modified_at
      last modification date of this record

    • modified_by

      @PsaRstApiMapFld("PSC_MOD") @PsaRstApiMapUsr public String modified_by
      user name of the person who was the last one to modify this record

    • DEFAULT_DATA

      public static final String DEFAULT_DATA
      The place holder data to indicate that the default value for a field should be used
